author: Reuters Editorial
title: Japan's Recruit to buy job site operator Glassdoor for $1.2 bln
text:
TOKYO, May 9 (Reuters) - Japanâ€™s Recruit Holdings Co said on Wednesday it has agreed to buy popular California-based job-site operator Glassdoor Inc for $1.2 billion with cash on hand.
Glassdoor will continue to be led by its current CEO and co-founder, Robert Hohman, Recruit said in a statement.
The transaction is expected to close during the July-September quarter, subject to regulatory approvals, it said. (Reporting by Chang-Ran Kim; Editing by Stephen Coates)
